title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
EB: Currently, when there is no data available for a series, no error message is displayed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the application and navigate to the series section. 2. Configure the series to not have any data. 3. Check if a friendly error message is displayed.
